DOC.brief_summary: Background : The Teen Health Information Literacy Project after-school program high school student . It give skill access valid reliable health data . It also aim grow young health advocate . Researchers want find impact program student . They want use feedback improve program . Objective : To gain feedback Teen Health Information Literacy Project . Eligibility : Young people participate Teen Health Information Literacy Project . The project run Area Health Education Centers ( AHECs ) sponsor National Library Medicine ( NLM ) . Design : The study explain student program session . They take consent form home parent . Participants split 6 focus group . Each one conduct AHEC project site . The focus group 90-minute discussion participant evaluator NLM . The evaluator present either person video conference . The evaluator ask participant question , may include follow . What like dislike program ? Why decide participate ? What learn ? Would recommend program another student ? How program affect interest health-related career ? The discussion audio-recorded . The evaluator use automate tool convert recording text . After , destroy audio .
DOC.brief_title: Educational Impact NLM/National Area Health Education Center Organization ( NAO ) Project-SHARE Based Teen Health Information Literacy Curriculum
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study evaluate impact National Library Medicine ( NLM ) / National Area Health Education Center Organization ( NAO ) Teen Health Information Literacy Curriculum ( base earlier Project SHARE curriculum ) participant : understanding health disparity community ; leadership , health advocacy , communication skill ; sense self connectedness community ; interest health-related career . Study population : The study population consist program participant five participate site , include local AHEC chapter Boston , Brooklyn-Queens-Long Island , Colorado , Eastern Connecticut , Montana . The program participant middle high school student , range age 13 18 year old . All participant invite participate . Design : The study involve moderate focus group participate site . Outcome measure : participant understand health disparity community ; leadership , health advocacy , communication skill ; sense self connectedness community ; interest health-related career .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Participation NLM / NAO Teen Health Information Literacy Project EXCLUSION CRITERIA :
